pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.description: BULBASAUR can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

descriptions.text: BULBASAUR can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
Dieses Pokémon trägt von Geburt an einen Samen auf dem Rücken, der mit ihm keimt und wächst.

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.description: To support its bulb, IVYSAUR’s legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.

descriptions.text: To support its bulb, IVYSAUR’s legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.
Es trägt eine Knospe auf seinem Rücken. Nimmt es Nahrung zu sich, soll aus der Knospe eine große blühende Blume werden.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.description: VENUSAUR’s flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.

descriptions.text: VENUSAUR’s flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower’s aroma soothes the emotions of people.
Es spreizt die breiten Blätter seiner Blüte, um seinen Körper mit Sonnenenergie zu durchfluten.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.description: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when CHARMANDER is happy, and blazes when it is enraged.

descriptions.text: The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when CHARMANDER is happy, and blazes when it is enraged.
Die Flamme auf seiner Schweifspitze zeigt die Lebensenergie an. Ist es gesund, leuchtet sie hell.

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.description: Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.

descriptions.text: Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.
Es schlägt im Kampf mit seinem Schwanz nach seinen Gegnern. Anschließend zerfetzt es die Gegner mit seinen scharfen Klauen.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.description: A CHARIZARD flies about in search of strong opponents. It breathes intense flames that can melt any material. However, it will never torch a weaker foe.

descriptions.text: A CHARIZARD flies about in search of strong opponents. It breathes intense flames that can melt any material. However, it will never torch a weaker foe.
Wenn dieses Pokémon einen Strahl glühenden Feuers speit, leuchtet seine Schwanzspitze auf.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.description: Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling SQUIRTLE to swim at high speeds.

descriptions.text: Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling SQUIRTLE to swim at high speeds.
Es zieht sich in seinen Panzer zurück und greift dann mit Wasserstrahlen seine Gegner an.

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.description: Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this POKéMON’s toughness in battle.

descriptions.text: Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this POKéMON’s toughness in battle.
Bei Gefahr zieht dieses Pokémon seinen Kopf ein. Die Schwanzspitze ragt jedoch aus dem Panzer heraus.

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.description: The waterspouts that protrude from its shell are highly accurate. Their bullets of water can precisely nail tin cans from a distance of over 160 feet.

descriptions.text: The waterspouts that protrude from its shell are highly accurate. Their bullets of water can precisely nail tin cans from a distance of over 160 feet.
Es begräbt seine Gegner mit seinem enormen Körpergewicht. Wenn es in einer aussichtslosen Lage steckt, zieht es sich in seinen Panzer zurück.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.description: It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

descriptions.text: It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
Ein vorwiegend in Wäldern lebendes Pokémon, das zur Verteidigung mit den Flügeln Sand aufwirbelt.

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.description: This POKéMON flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

descriptions.text: This POKéMON flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
Die Krallen an seinen Füßen sind sehr ausgeprägt. Es kann sogar ein Owei zu seinem Nest in 100 km Entfernung tragen.

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
pokemon.description: This POKéMON has gorgeous, glossy feathers. Many TRAINERS are so captivated by the beautiful feathers on its head that they choose PIDGEOT as their POKéMON.

descriptions.text: This POKéMON has gorgeous, glossy feathers. Many TRAINERS are so captivated by the beautiful feathers on its head that they choose PIDGEOT as their POKéMON.
Dieses Pokémon schnellt bei der Jagd blitzschnell unter Wasser, um seine ahnungslose Beute zu fangen.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.description: It stores electricity in the electric sacs on its cheeks. When it releases pent-up energy in a burst, the electric power is equal to a lightning bolt.

descriptions.text: It stores electricity in the electric sacs on its cheeks. When it releases pent-up energy in a burst, the electric power is equal to a lightning bolt.
Es streckt seinen Schweif nach oben, um seine Umgebung zu prüfen. Häufig fährt ein Blitz hinein.

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.description: If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.

descriptions.text: If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.
Wenn es sich auflädt, zucken seine Muskeln und es wird aggressiver und kampflustiger.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.description: When exposed to a strong wind, a GASTLY’s gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

descriptions.text: When exposed to a strong wind, a GASTLY’s gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
Es hat einen gasförmigen Körper. Es kann jeden Gegner mit Giftgas einnebeln und dadurch ersticken.

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.description: If a HAUNTER beckons you while it is floating in darkness, don’t approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.

descriptions.text: If a HAUNTER beckons you while it is floating in darkness, don’t approach it. This POKéMON will try to lick you with its tongue and steal your life away.
Falls du im Dunkeln das Gefühl hast, beobachtet zu werden und niemand ist zu sehen, ist es bestimmt Alpollo.

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.description: Deep in the night, your shadow cast by a streetlight may suddenly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past you, pretending to be your shadow.

descriptions.text: Deep in the night, your shadow cast by a streetlight may suddenly overtake you. It is actually a GENGAR running past you, pretending to be your shadow.
Es versteckt sich im Schatten. Man sagt, wenn sich ein Gengar versteckt, kühlt es sich um 5 °C ab.

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.description: People have driven LAPRAS almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, it is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.

descriptions.text: People have driven LAPRAS almost to the point of extinction. In the evenings, it is said to sing plaintively as it seeks what few others of its kind still remain.
Sie sind gutmütig. Da sie selten kämpfen, wurden sie oft gefangen. Ihre Anzahl ist stark reduziert.

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.description: SNORLAX’s typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile POKéMON that there are children who use its big belly as a place to play.

descriptions.text: SNORLAX’s typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping. It is such a docile POKéMON that there are children who use its big belly as a place to play.
Es ist erst satt, wenn es über 400 kg Nahrung am Tag gefressen hat. Ist es mit dem Essen fertig, schläft es sofort ein.

pokemon.name: Articuno
pokemon.description: ARTICUNO is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this POKéMON flies, snow will fall.

descriptions.text: ARTICUNO is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control ice. The flapping of its wings chills the air. As a result, it is said that when this POKéMON flies, snow will fall.
Ein Legendäres Vogel-Pokémon. Es kann Blizzards verursachen, indem es Feuchtigkeit gefriert.

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.description: ZAPDOS is a legendary bird POKéMON that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. It gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.

descriptions.text: ZAPDOS is a legendary bird POKéMON that has the ability to control electricity. It usually lives in thunderclouds. It gains power if it is stricken by lightning bolts.
Ein Legendäres Vogel-Pokémon, das im Sturzflug aus den Wolken bricht und Blitze schleudert.

pokemon.name: Moltres
pokemon.description: MOLTRES is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control fire. If injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.

descriptions.text: MOLTRES is a legendary bird POKéMON that can control fire. If injured, it is said to dip its body in the molten magma of a volcano to burn and heal itself.
Dieses Pokémon ist der Legendäre Feuervogel. Sein Flügelschlag entfacht ein helles Feuermeer.

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.description: A DRATINI continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.

descriptions.text: A DRATINI continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.
Man nennt es „Illusion-Pokémon“, denn nur wenige haben es gesehen. Nur seine Haut wurde oft gefunden.

pokemon.name: Dragonair
pokemon.description: A DRAGONAIR stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter the weather around it by loosing energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.

descriptions.text: A DRAGONAIR stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter the weather around it by loosing energy from the crystals on its neck and tail.
Die kristallenen Bälle an seinem Schweif ermöglichen es ihm, das Wetter zu beeinflussen.

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.description: It can circle the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted POKéMON that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.

descriptions.text: It can circle the globe in just 16 hours. It is a kindhearted POKéMON that leads lost and foundering ships in a storm to the safety of land.
Trotz seines wuchtigen und massiven Körpers kann es fliegen. Es umrundet den Erdball in nur 16 Stunden.

pokemon.name: Chikorita
pokemon.description: It waves its leaf around to keep foes at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, creating a friendly atmosphere that becalms the battlers.

descriptions.text: It waves its leaf around to keep foes at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, creating a friendly atmosphere that becalms the battlers.
Ein süßer Duft geht von dem Blatt auf seinem Kopf aus. Es ist ruhig und liegt gerne in der Sonne.

pokemon.name: Bayleef
pokemon.description: A BAYLEEF’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each leaf is a small tree shoot. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.

descriptions.text: A BAYLEEF’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each leaf is a small tree shoot. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.
Ein würziges Aroma geht von seinen Blättern aus. Das Aroma soll gesundheitsfördernd sein.

pokemon.name: Meganium
pokemon.description: The fragrance of a MEGANIUM’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, it gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.

descriptions.text: The fragrance of a MEGANIUM’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, it gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.
Das Aroma aus seiner Blüte enthält Stoffe, die jegliche Aggressivität schwinden lassen.

pokemon.name: Cyndaquil
pokemon.description: It flares flames from its back to protect itself. The fire burns vigorously if the POKéMON is angry. When it is tired, it sputters with incomplete combustion.

descriptions.text: It flares flames from its back to protect itself. The fire burns vigorously if the POKéMON is angry. When it is tired, it sputters with incomplete combustion.
Es ist ruhig und kugelt sich stets zusammen. Zum Schutz entflammt es seinen Rücken.

pokemon.name: Quilava
pokemon.description: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching an enemy.

descriptions.text: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching an enemy.
Vor dem Kampf dreht es dem Feind den Rücken zu, um ihm zu zeigen, wie Furcht erregend sein Feuer lodert.

pokemon.name: Typhlosion
pokemon.description: It can hide behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intense flames. TYPHLOSION create blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

descriptions.text: It can hide behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intense flames. TYPHLOSION create blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
Wenn sein Zorn den Zenit übersteigt, wird es so heiß, dass alles, was es berührt, in Flammen aufgeht.

pokemon.name: Totodile
pokemon.description: Despite its small body, TOTODILE’s jaws are very powerful. While it may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough strength to cause serious injury.

descriptions.text: Despite its small body, TOTODILE’s jaws are very powerful. While it may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough strength to cause serious injury.
Es ist klein, aber zäh und stark. Es zögert nicht, jeden anzugreifen, wenn dieser ihm zu nahe kommt.

pokemon.name: Croconaw
pokemon.description: Once its jaws clamp down on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like fishhooks, they become irremovably embedded.

descriptions.text: Once its jaws clamp down on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like fishhooks, they become irremovably embedded.
Verliert es einen seiner Zähne, wächst ein neuer nach. Es hat immer 48 Zähne in seinem Kiefer.

pokemon.name: Feraligatr
pokemon.description: It opens its huge mouth to intimidate enemies. In battle, it runs using its thick and powerful hind legs to charge the foe with incredible speed.

descriptions.text: It opens its huge mouth to intimidate enemies. In battle, it runs using its thick and powerful hind legs to charge the foe with incredible speed.
Eigentlich bewegt es sich langsam, doch seine Beute greift es blitzschnell an.

pokemon.name: Treecko
pokemon.description: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory. It is said to be the protector of the forest’s trees.

descriptions.text: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory. It is said to be the protector of the forest’s trees.
Es klettert blitzschnell Wände empor. Mit seinem Schwanz misst es die Luftfeuchtigkeit, um das Wetter am nächsten Tag vorherzusagen.

pokemon.name: Grovyle
pokemon.description: Leaves grow out of this POKéMON’s body. They help obscure a GROVYLE from the eyes of its enemies while it is in a thickly overgrown forest.

descriptions.text: Leaves grow out of this POKéMON’s body. They help obscure a GROVYLE from the eyes of its enemies while it is in a thickly overgrown forest.
Seine stark entwickelten Oberschenkelmuskeln verleihen ihm außergewöhnliche Agilität und Sprungkraft.

pokemon.name: Sceptile
pokemon.description: In the jungle, its power is without equal. This POKéMON carefully grows trees and plants. It regulates its body temperature by basking in sunlight.

descriptions.text: In the jungle, its power is without equal. This POKéMON carefully grows trees and plants. It regulates its body temperature by basking in sunlight.
Die Blätter an seinen Armen können dicke Bäume fällen. Im Dschungelkampf gibt es kein stärkeres Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Torchic
pokemon.description: If attacked, it strikes back by spitting balls of fire it forms in its stomach. A TORCHIC dislikes darkness because it can’t see its surroundings.

descriptions.text: If attacked, it strikes back by spitting balls of fire it forms in its stomach. A TORCHIC dislikes darkness because it can’t see its surroundings.
In seinem Bauch ist ein Flammensack, der stets brennt. Umarmt man es, fühlt es sich warm an.

pokemon.name: Combusken
pokemon.description: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.

descriptions.text: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.
Es kann zehn Tritte pro Sekunde austeilen. Es gibt schrille Schreie von sich, um Gegner einzuschüchtern.

pokemon.name: Blaziken
pokemon.description: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.

descriptions.text: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.
Mühelos springt es selbst über 30-stöckige Häuser. Sein Feuerschlag fügt dem Gegner Verbrennungen zu.

pokemon.name: Mudkip
pokemon.description: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water’s edge.

descriptions.text: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water’s edge.
Durch den propellerartigen Einsatz seiner großen Schwanzflosse schwimmt es schnell durchs Wasser. Trotz seiner kleinen Größe ist es stark.

pokemon.name: Marshtomp
pokemon.description: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.

descriptions.text: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.
Seine kräftigen Beine geben ihm sicheren Halt. Es gräbt sich in Dreck ein, wenn es schlafen will.

pokemon.name: Swampert
pokemon.description: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.

descriptions.text: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.
Schon ein Hieb seiner steinharten Arme schlägt selbst den stärksten Felsen zu Bruch.

pokemon.name: Ralts
pokemon.description: A RALTS has the power to sense the emotions of people and POKéMON with the horns on its head. It takes cover if it senses any hostility.

descriptions.text: A RALTS has the power to sense the emotions of people and POKéMON with the horns on its head. It takes cover if it senses any hostility.
Es erfasst warme Gefühle von Menschen und Pokémon mit seinen Hörnern und wärmt sich daran auf.

pokemon.name: Kirlia
pokemon.description: A KIRLIA has the psychic power to create  a rip in the dimensions and see into the future. It is said to dance with pleasure on sunny mornings.

descriptions.text: A KIRLIA has the psychic power to create  a rip in the dimensions and see into the future. It is said to dance with pleasure on sunny mornings.
Die fröhliche Stimmung seines Trainers verleiht ihm Energie für psychokinetische Kraft. Wenn es glücklich ist, tanzt und dreht es sich.

pokemon.name: Gardevoir
pokemon.description: It apparently does not feel the pull of gravity because it supports itself with psychic power. It will give its life to protect its TRAINER.

descriptions.text: It apparently does not feel the pull of gravity because it supports itself with psychic power. It will give its life to protect its TRAINER.
Erzeugt ein kleines schwarzes Loch mithilfe all seiner Psycho-Kräfte, um seinen Trainer zu schützen.

moves.name: vine-whip
moves.description: Strikes the foe with slender, whiplike vines.

descriptions.text: Strikes the foe with slender, whiplike vines.
Peitschenähnlicher Schlag mit Ranken.

moves.name: sleep-powder
moves.description: Scatters a powder that may cause the foe to sleep.

descriptions.text: Scatters a powder that may cause the foe to sleep.
Verstreut Schlafpuder, der das Ziel eventuell in Schlaf versetzt.

moves.name: leech-seed
moves.description: Plants a seed on the foe to steal HP on every turn.

descriptions.text: Plants a seed on the foe to steal HP on every turn.
Ziel wird bepflanzt und verliert jede Runde KP, die ein Pokémon aus dem Team des Anwenders heilen.

moves.name: growth
moves.description: Forces the body to grow and heightens SP. ATK.

descriptions.text: Forces the body to grow and heightens SP. ATK.
Der Körper wächst. Dadurch steigen Angriff und Spezial-Angriff.

moves.name: sweet-scent
moves.description: Allures the foe to reduce evasiveness.

descriptions.text: Allures the foe to reduce evasiveness.
Lockt Ziele an und senkt deren Fluchtwert. Lockt im Gras auch wilde Pokémon an.

moves.name: razor-leaf
moves.description: Cuts the enemy with leaves. High critical-hit ratio.

descriptions.text: Cuts the enemy with leaves. High critical-hit ratio.
Trifft das Ziel mit Blättern. Hohe Volltrefferquote.

moves.name: growl
moves.description: Growls cutely to reduce the foe’s ATTACK.

descriptions.text: Growls cutely to reduce the foe’s ATTACK.
Der Anwender nimmt das Ziel für sich ein und senkt dessen Angriffs-Wert.

moves.name: tackle
moves.description: Charges the foe with a full- body tackle.

descriptions.text: Charges the foe with a full- body tackle.
Trifft das Ziel mit vollem Körpereinsatz.

moves.name: solar-beam
moves.description: Absorbs light in one turn, then attacks next turn.

descriptions.text: Absorbs light in one turn, then attacks next turn.
Absorbiert Licht in Runde 1. In Runde 2 erfolgt der Angriff.

moves.name: synthesis
moves.description: Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.

descriptions.text: Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.
Füllt KP des Anwenders auf. Die Menge hängt vom Wetter ab.

moves.name: poison-powder
moves.description: Scatters a toxic powder that may poison the foe.

descriptions.text: Scatters a toxic powder that may poison the foe.
Verstreut giftigen Puder auf das Ziel.

moves.name: rage
moves.description: Raises the user’s ATTACK every time it is hit.

descriptions.text: Raises the user’s ATTACK every time it is hit.
Erhöht Angriff des Anwenders, wenn dieser getroffen wird, solange die Attacke aktiviert ist.

moves.name: flamethrower
moves.description: A powerful fire attack that may inflict a burn.

descriptions.text: A powerful fire attack that may inflict a burn.
Starke Feuer-Attacke, durch die das Ziel eventuell Verbrennungen erleidet.

moves.name: slash
moves.description: Slashes with claws, etc. Has a high critical-hit ratio.

descriptions.text: Slashes with claws, etc. Has a high critical-hit ratio.
Hieb mit Klauen oder Ähnlichem. Hohe Volltrefferquote.

moves.name: smokescreen
moves.description: Lowers the foe’s accuracy using smoke, ink, etc.

descriptions.text: Lowers the foe’s accuracy using smoke, ink, etc.
Senkt Genauigkeit des Zieles mit Rauch, Tinte oder Ähnlichem.

moves.name: scratch
moves.description: Scratches the foe with sharp claws.

descriptions.text: Scratches the foe with sharp claws.
Das Ziel wird mit scharfen Klauen zerkratzt.

moves.name: fire-spin
moves.description: Traps the foe in a ring of fire for 2 to 5 turns.

descriptions.text: Traps the foe in a ring of fire for 2 to 5 turns.
Das Ziel wird für vier bis fünf Runden in einem Feuerkreis gefangen.

moves.name: ember
moves.description: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.

descriptions.text: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.
Schwache Feuer-Attacke, durch die das Ziel eventuell Verbrennungen erleidet.

moves.name: scary-face
moves.description: Frightens with a scary face to sharply reduce SPEED.

descriptions.text: Frightens with a scary face to sharply reduce SPEED.
Jagt dem Ziel mit einer Grimasse Angst ein. Dessen Initiative-Wert sinkt stark.

moves.name: dragon-rage
moves.description: Launches shock waves that always inflict 40 HP damage.

descriptions.text: Launches shock waves that always inflict 40 HP damage.
Stößt eine wutgeladene Schockwelle aus, die stets 40 KP Schaden anrichtet.

moves.name: wing-attack
moves.description: Strikes the foe with wings spread wide.

descriptions.text: Strikes the foe with wings spread wide.
Trifft das Ziel mit ausgebreiteten Flügeln.

moves.name: rapid-spin
moves.description: Spins the body at high speed to strike the foe.

descriptions.text: Spins the body at high speed to strike the foe.
Trifft das Ziel mit einer Dreh-Attacke. Befreit sich unter anderem von Wickel, Klammergriff, Egelsamen und Stachler.

moves.name: withdraw
moves.description: Withdraws the body into its hard shell to raise DEFENSE.

descriptions.text: Withdraws the body into its hard shell to raise DEFENSE.
Rückzug in den harten Panzer. Erhöht den Verteidigungs-Wert.

moves.name: skull-bash
moves.description: Tucks in the head, then attacks on the next turn.

descriptions.text: Tucks in the head, then attacks on the next turn.
Der Anwender erhöht in Runde 1 seine Verteidigung und greift in Runde 2 an.

moves.name: hydro-pump
moves.description: Blasts water at high power to strike the foe.

descriptions.text: Blasts water at high power to strike the foe.
Spritzt eine Menge Wasser mit Hochdruck auf das Ziel.

moves.name: protect
moves.description: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.

descriptions.text: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.
Anwender weicht jeder Attacke aus. Scheitert eventuell bei Wiederholung.

moves.name: water-gun
moves.description: Squirts water to attack the foe.

descriptions.text: Squirts water to attack the foe.
Das Ziel wird mit Wasser bespritzt.

moves.name: tail-whip
moves.description: Wags the tail to lower the foe’s DEFENSE.

descriptions.text: Wags the tail to lower the foe’s DEFENSE.
Hieb mit dem Schweif. Senkt die Verteidigung des Zieles.

moves.name: bite
moves.description: Bites with vicious fangs. May cause flinching.

descriptions.text: Bites with vicious fangs. May cause flinching.
Beißt zu und lässt das Ziel eventuell zurückschrecken.

moves.name: bubble
moves.description: An attack using bubbles. May lower the foe’s SPEED.

descriptions.text: An attack using bubbles. May lower the foe’s SPEED.
Angriff mit Blasen. Initiative-Wert des Zieles wird eventuell gesenkt.

moves.name: rain-dance
moves.description: Boosts the power of WATER- type moves for 5 turns.

descriptions.text: Boosts the power of WATER- type moves for 5 turns.
Anwender erzeugt starken Regen. Die Stärke von Wasser-Attacken erhöht sich fünf Runden lang.

moves.name: feather-dance
moves.description: Envelops the foe with down to sharply reduce ATTACK.

descriptions.text: Envelops the foe with down to sharply reduce ATTACK.
Hüllt das Ziel in Daunen und senkt dessen Angriffs-Wert stark.

moves.name: mirror-move
moves.description: Counters the foe’s attack with the same move.

descriptions.text: Counters the foe’s attack with the same move.
Kopiert die letzte Attacke des Zieles und greift es an.

moves.name: sand-attack
moves.description: Reduces the foe’s accuracy by hurling sand in its face.

descriptions.text: Reduces the foe’s accuracy by hurling sand in its face.
Senkt Genauigkeit des Zieles, indem ihm Sand ins Gesicht geworfen wird.

moves.name: gust
moves.description: Strikes the foe with a gust of wind whipped up by wings.

descriptions.text: Strikes the foe with a gust of wind whipped up by wings.
Trifft das Ziel mit einem Windstoß durch einen Flügelschlag.

moves.name: quick-attack
moves.description: An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.

descriptions.text: An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.
Sehr schneller Angriff mit Erstschlaggarantie.

moves.name: whirlwind
moves.description: Blows away the foe with wind and ends the battle.

descriptions.text: Blows away the foe with wind and ends the battle.
Weht das Ziel weg und ersetzt es durch ein anderes Pokémon. In der Wildnis endet der Kampf.

moves.name: agility
moves.description: Relaxes the body to sharply boost SPEED.

descriptions.text: Relaxes the body to sharply boost SPEED.
Entspannt den Körper, um den Initiative-Wert stark zu steigern.

moves.name: slam
moves.description: Slams the foe with a long tail, vine, etc.

descriptions.text: Slams the foe with a long tail, vine, etc.
Schlag mit einem langen Schweif, einer Ranke oder Ähnlichem.

moves.name: thunder-wave
moves.description: A weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the foe.

descriptions.text: A weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the foe.
Ein schwacher Stromstoß, der das Ziel paralysiert.

moves.name: thunder-shock
moves.description: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

descriptions.text: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.
Eine Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.

moves.name: thunder
moves.description: A lightning attack that may cause paralysis.

descriptions.text: A lightning attack that may cause paralysis.
Eine verheerende Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.

moves.name: double-team
moves.description: Creates illusory copies to raise evasiveness.

descriptions.text: Creates illusory copies to raise evasiveness.
Erzeugt durch schnelle Bewegungen Ebenbilder, um den Fluchtwert zu erhöhen.

moves.name: light-screen
moves.description: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.

descriptions.text: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.
Erzeugt eine Lichtwand und senkt den Schaden durch Spezial-Angriffe für fünf Runden.

moves.name: thunderbolt
moves.description: A strong electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

descriptions.text: A strong electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.
Eine starke Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.

moves.name: hypnosis
moves.description: A hypnotizing move that may induce sleep.

descriptions.text: A hypnotizing move that may induce sleep.
Hypnose-Attacke, die das Ziel in Schlaf versetzt.

moves.name: night-shade
moves.description: Inflicts damage identical to the user’s level.

descriptions.text: Inflicts damage identical to the user’s level.
Das Ziel sieht eine Illusion. Richtet Schaden gemäß dem Level des Anwenders an.

moves.name: lick
moves.description: Licks with a long tongue to injure. May also paralyze.

descriptions.text: Licks with a long tongue to injure. May also paralyze.
Leck-Attacke mit langer Zunge. Das Ziel wird eventuell paralysiert.

moves.name: spite
moves.description: Spitefully cuts the PP of the foe’s last move.

descriptions.text: Spitefully cuts the PP of the foe’s last move.
AP der letzten Attacke des Zieles werden um 4 gesenkt.

moves.name: mean-look
moves.description: Fixes the foe with a mean look that prevents escape.

descriptions.text: Fixes the foe with a mean look that prevents escape.
Böser Blick, der die Flucht des Zieles vereitelt.

moves.name: curse
moves.description: A move that functions differently for GHOSTS.

descriptions.text: A move that functions differently for GHOSTS.
Attacke, deren Wirkung davon abhängt, ob der Anwender ein Geist-Pokémon ist.

moves.name: confuse-ray
moves.description: A sinister ray that confuses the foe.

descriptions.text: A sinister ray that confuses the foe.
Ein fieser Strahl, der das Ziel verwirrt.

moves.name: dream-eater
moves.description: Takes one half the damage inflicted on a sleeping foe.

descriptions.text: Takes one half the damage inflicted on a sleeping foe.
Attacke gegen schlafendes Ziel. Die Hälfte des zugefügten Schadens wird dem Anwender gutgeschrieben.

moves.name: destiny-bond
moves.description: If the user faints, the foe is also made to faint.

descriptions.text: If the user faints, the foe is also made to faint.
Wird der Anwender nach Einsatz dieser Attacke besiegt, führt dies auch beim Ziel zum K.O.

moves.name: shadow-punch
moves.description: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

descriptions.text: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.
Angriff mit der Faust aus dem Schattenreich. Ausweichen unmöglich.

moves.name: body-slam
moves.description: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.

descriptions.text: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.
Trifft das Ziel mit vollem Körpereinsatz. Bewirkt eventuell Paralyse.

moves.name: sing
moves.description: A soothing song lulls the foe into a deep slumber.

descriptions.text: A soothing song lulls the foe into a deep slumber.
Ein Lied, das das Ziel in tiefen Schlaf versetzt.

moves.name: perish-song
moves.description: Any POKéMON hearing this song faints in 3 turns.

descriptions.text: Wer diese Musik hört, wird nach drei Runden besiegt. Rettung ist durch den Eintausch eines neuen Pokémon möglich.
Any POKéMON hearing this song faints in 3 turns.

moves.name: mist
moves.description: Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.

descriptions.text: Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.
Anwender schützt das Team mit einem Nebel. Verhindert Statussenkungen für fünf Runden.

moves.name: sheer-cold
moves.description: A chilling attack that causes fainting if it hits.

descriptions.text: A chilling attack that causes fainting if it hits.
Angriff mit Kälte, die das Ziel bei Erfolg besiegt.

moves.name: safeguard
moves.description: A mystical force prevents all status problems.

descriptions.text: A mystical force prevents all status problems.
Team des Anwenders ist fünf Runden vor Statusproblemen geschützt.

moves.name: belly-drum
moves.description: Maximizes ATTACK while sacrificing HP.

descriptions.text: Maximizes ATTACK while sacrificing HP.
Der Anwender maximiert den Angriffs-Wert auf Kosten der Hälfte seiner maximalen KP.

moves.name: block
moves.description: Blocks the foe’s way to prevent escape.

descriptions.text: Blocks the foe’s way to prevent escape.
Anwender versperrt den Fluchtweg des Zieles.

moves.name: amnesia
moves.description: Forgets about something and sharply raises SP. DEF.

descriptions.text: Forgets about something and sharply raises SP. DEF.
Gedächtnisverlust, der die Spezial-Verteidigung stark erhöht.

moves.name: covet
moves.description: Cutely begs to obtain an item held by the foe.

descriptions.text: Cutely begs to obtain an item held by the foe.
Bittet charmant um das getragene Item des Zieles und stiehlt es dann.

moves.name: headbutt
moves.description: A ramming attack that may cause flinching.

descriptions.text: A ramming attack that may cause flinching.
Rammt das Ziel mit einer Kopfnuss. Ziel schreckt eventuell zurück.

moves.name: snore
moves.description: A loud attack that can be used only while asleep.

descriptions.text: A loud attack that can be used only while asleep.
Attacke nur im Schlaf möglich. Ziel schreckt eventuell zurück.

moves.name: rest
moves.description: The user sleeps for 2 turns, restoring HP and status.

descriptions.text: The user sleeps for 2 turns, restoring HP and status.
Anwender wird vollkommen geheilt und schläft die folgenden zwei Runden.

moves.name: mind-reader
moves.description: Senses the foe’s action to ensure the next move’s hit.

descriptions.text: Senses the foe’s action to ensure the next move’s hit.
Ahnt Bewegungen des Zieles voraus, um zu gewährleisten, dass die nächste eigene Attacke trifft.

moves.name: reflect
moves.description: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.

descriptions.text: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.
Eine mysteriöse Wand, die fünf Runden den Schaden von physischen gegnerischen Treffern reduziert.

moves.name: ice-beam
moves.description: Blasts the foe with an icy beam that may freeze it.

descriptions.text: Blasts the foe with an icy beam that may freeze it.
Das Ziel wird von einem Eisstrahl getroffen und friert eventuell ein.

moves.name: hyper-beam
moves.description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

descriptions.text: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.
Starke Attacke, die den Anwender zwingt, eine Runde auszusetzen.

moves.name: drill-peck
moves.description: A corkscrewing attack with the beak acting as a drill.

descriptions.text: A corkscrewing attack with the beak acting as a drill.
Korkenzieherangriff, bei dem der Schnabel als Bohrer dient.

moves.name: peck
moves.description: Attacks the foe with a jabbing beak, etc.

descriptions.text: Attacks the foe with a jabbing beak, etc.
Greift das Ziel mit dem Schnabel oder Horn an.

moves.name: detect
moves.description: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.

descriptions.text: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.
Anwender weicht jeder Attacke aus. Scheitert eventuell bei Wiederholung.

moves.name: charge
moves.description: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.

descriptions.text: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.
Lädt Energie für die kommende Elektro-Attacke auf. Erhöht die Spezial-Verteidigung.

moves.name: defense-curl
moves.description: Curls up to conceal weak spots and raise DEFENSE.

descriptions.text: Curls up to conceal weak spots and raise DEFENSE.
Verbirgt Schwächen durch Einrollen und hebt gleichzeitig den Verteidigungs-Wert.

moves.name: rollout
moves.description: An attack lasting 5 turns with rising intensity.

descriptions.text: An attack lasting 5 turns with rising intensity.
Attacke, die fünf Runden dauert. Die Härte nimmt von Mal zu Mal zu.

moves.name: blizzard
moves.description: Hits the foe with an icy storm that may freeze it.

descriptions.text: Hits the foe with an icy storm that may freeze it.
Ein Schneesturm wütet, der das Ziel einfrieren kann.

moves.name: yawn
moves.description: Lulls the foe into yawning, then sleeping next turn.

descriptions.text: Lulls the foe into yawning, then sleeping next turn.
Angreifer gähnt und das Ziel schläft in der nächsten Runde ein.

moves.name: heat-wave
moves.description: Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.

descriptions.text: Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.
Ziele werden von Sturm aus heißer Luft getroffen und verbrennen sich eventuell.

moves.name: endure
moves.description: Endures any attack for 1 turn, leaving at least 1HP.

descriptions.text: Endures any attack for 1 turn, leaving at least 1HP.
Nach fatalen Attacken bleibt stets 1 KP übrig. Misserfolg bei Wiederholung möglich.

moves.name: powder-snow
moves.description: Blasts the foe with a snowy gust. May cause freezing.

descriptions.text: Blasts the foe with a snowy gust. May cause freezing.
Angriff mit Schnee. Das Ziel wird eventuell eingefroren.

moves.name: sky-attack
moves.description: Searches out weak spots, then strikes the next turn.

descriptions.text: Searches out weak spots, then strikes the next turn.
Anwender greift in der zweiten Runde mit hoher Volltrefferquote an. Ziel schreckt eventuell zurück.

moves.name: wrap
moves.description: Wraps and squeezes the foe 2 to 5 times with vines, etc.

descriptions.text: Wraps and squeezes the foe 2 to 5 times with vines, etc.
Umwickelt das Ziel über vier bis fünf Runden mit Ranken oder Ähnlichem und fügt ihm Schaden zu.

moves.name: twister
moves.description: Whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe.

descriptions.text: Whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe.
Trifft Ziele in der Umgebung mit einem heftigen Wirbelsturm, was diese eventuell zurückschrecken lässt.

moves.name: outrage
moves.description: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.

descriptions.text: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.
Attacke über zwei bis drei Runden, die den Anwender verwirrt.

moves.name: leer
moves.description: Frightens the foe with a leer to lower DEFENSE.

descriptions.text: Frightens the foe with a leer to lower DEFENSE.
Gegnerischer Verteidigungs-Wert wird durch angsteinflößenden Blick gesenkt.

moves.name: flame-wheel
moves.description: A fiery charge attack that may inflict a burn.

descriptions.text: A fiery charge attack that may inflict a burn.
Feuer-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell verbrennt.

moves.name: swift
moves.description: Sprays star-shaped rays that never miss.

descriptions.text: Sprays star-shaped rays that never miss.
Verschießt sternförmige Strahlen, die stets treffen, auf Ziele in der Umgebung.

moves.name: screech
moves.description: Emits a screech to sharply reduce the foe’s DEFENSE.

descriptions.text: Emits a screech to sharply reduce the foe’s DEFENSE.
Stößt einen Schrei aus, um die Verteidigung des Zieles stark zu senken.

moves.name: mega-drain
moves.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.

descriptions.text: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.
Attacke, die die Hälfte des Schadens absorbiert.

moves.name: pound
moves.description: Pounds the foe with forelegs or tail.

descriptions.text: Pounds the foe with forelegs or tail.
Ein Hieb mit den Vorderbeinen oder dem Schweif.

moves.name: giga-drain
moves.description: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.

descriptions.text: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.
Das Ziel wird angegriffen und die Hälfte des zugefügten Schadens dem Angreifer als KP gutgeschrieben.

moves.name: pursuit
moves.description: Inflicts bad damage if used on a foe switching out.

descriptions.text: Inflicts bad damage if used on a foe switching out.
Die Attacke richtet beim Ziel doppelten Schaden an, falls es ausgetauscht wird.

moves.name: absorb
moves.description: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.

descriptions.text: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.
Attacke, die die Hälfte des Schadens absorbiert.

moves.name: leaf-blade
moves.description: Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio.

descriptions.text: Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio.
Hieb mit scharfkantigem Blatt. Hohe Volltrefferquote.

moves.name: false-swipe
moves.description: An attack that leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.

descriptions.text: An attack that leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.
Ein Angriff, der dem Ziel zumindest 1 KP lässt.

moves.name: fury-cutter
moves.description: An attack that intensifies on each successive hit.

descriptions.text: An attack that intensifies on each successive hit.
Eine Attacke mit Scheren oder Klauen, deren Härte bei aufeinanderfolgenden Treffern zunimmt.

moves.name: focus-energy
moves.description: Focuses power to raise the critical-hit ratio.

descriptions.text: Focuses power to raise the critical-hit ratio.
Anwender atmet ein und bündelt Kraft. Die Volltrefferquote steigt dadurch.

moves.name: double-kick
moves.description: A double-kicking attack that strikes the foe twice.

descriptions.text: A double-kicking attack that strikes the foe twice.
Der Anwender tritt in einer Runde zweimal schnell zu.

moves.name: bulk-up
moves.description: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK and DEFENSE.

descriptions.text: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK and DEFENSE.
Pumpt den Körper auf, um den Angriff und die Verteidigung zu erhöhen.

moves.name: blaze-kick
moves.description: A kick with a high critical- hit ratio. May cause a burn.

descriptions.text: A kick with a high critical- hit ratio. May cause a burn.
Starker Tritt mit hoher Volltrefferquote. Verursacht eventuell Verbrennung.

moves.name: mud-sport
moves.description: Covers the user in mud to raise electrical resistance.

descriptions.text: Covers the user in mud to raise electrical resistance.
Schwächt Elektro-Attacken, solang der Anwender am Kampf teilnimmt.

moves.name: bide
moves.description: Endures attack for 2 turns to retaliate double.

descriptions.text: Endures attack for 2 turns to retaliate double.
Erträgt zwei Runden Angriffe und schlägt dann mit dem doppelten Wert des erlittenen Schadens zurück.

moves.name: whirlpool
moves.description: Traps and hurts the foe in a whirlpool for 2 to 5 turns.

descriptions.text: Traps and hurts the foe in a whirlpool for 2 to 5 turns.
Das Ziel wird für vier bis fünf Runden in einer Wasserhose gefangen.

moves.name: foresight
moves.description: Negates the foe’s efforts to heighten evasiveness.

descriptions.text: Negates the foe’s efforts to heighten evasiveness.
Erlaubt es, Geist-Pokémon mit Normal- und Kampf-Attacken anzugreifen. Ignoriert den Fluchtwert des Zieles.

moves.name: mud-slap
moves.description: Hurls mud in the foe’s face to reduce its accuracy.

descriptions.text: Hurls mud in the foe’s face to reduce its accuracy.
Schadet dem Ziel durch Matsch. Dessen Genauigkeit sinkt.

moves.name: take-down
moves.description: A reckless charge attack that also hurts the user.

descriptions.text: A reckless charge attack that also hurts the user.
Rücksichtslose Attacke, bei der sich der Angreifer selbst leicht verletzt.

moves.name: sky-uppercut
moves.description: An uppercut thrown as if leaping into the sky.

descriptions.text: An uppercut thrown as if leaping into the sky.
Kinnhaken, der das Ziel gen Himmel schickt.

moves.name: fire-punch
moves.description: A fiery punch that may burn the foe.

descriptions.text: A fiery punch that may burn the foe.
Feuriger Schlag, der dem Ziel eventuell Verbrennungen zufügt.

moves.name: muddy-water
moves.description: Attacks with muddy water. May lower accuracy.

descriptions.text: Attacks with muddy water. May lower accuracy.
Greift mit Matsch an und senkt eventuell die Genauigkeit des Zieles.

moves.name: mud-shot
moves.description: Hurls mud at the foe and reduces SPEED.

descriptions.text: Hurls mud at the foe and reduces SPEED.
Angriff mit Lehm, der den Initiative-Wert des Zieles senkt.

moves.name: earthquake
moves.description: A powerful quake, but has no effect on flying foes.

descriptions.text: A powerful quake, but has no effect on flying foes.
Ein mächtiges Beben, das die anderen Pokémon in der Nähe des Anwenders trifft.

moves.name: endeavor
moves.description: Gains power if the user’s HP is lower than the foe’s HP.

descriptions.text: Gains power if the user’s HP is lower than the foe’s HP.
Trifft nur, wenn KP des Anwenders geringer als KP des Zieles sind. Senkt dessen KP auf die Höhe der KP des Anwenders.

moves.name: teleport
moves.description: A psychic move for fleeing from battle instantly.

descriptions.text: A psychic move for fleeing from battle instantly.
Ermöglicht die sofortige Flucht vor wilden Pokémon. Kann den Anwender außerdem zum zuletzt besuchten Pokémon-Center teleportieren.

moves.name: imprison
moves.description: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.

descriptions.text: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.
Hindert Gegner am Einsatz von Attacken, die der Anwender selbst auch kennt.

moves.name: future-sight
moves.description: Heightens inner power to strike 2 turns later.

descriptions.text: Heightens inner power to strike 2 turns later.
Zwei Runden, nachdem Seher eingesetzt wurde, erfolgt der Angriff.

moves.name: calm-mind
moves.description: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.

descriptions.text: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.
Erhöht Spezial-Angriff und Spezial-Verteidigung durch Konzentration.

moves.name: psychic
moves.description: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.

descriptions.text: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.
Starke Psycho-Attacke, die eventuell die Spezial-Verteidigung des Zieles senkt.
